NCAA Lacrosse Championships
organizations: State University of New York at Albany
lead_paragraph: After three successful seasons playing collegiate lacrosse with his brother and cousin, Lyle Thompson will finish his collegiate career at Albany without his familiar teammates.
snippet: After three successful seasons playing collegiate lacrosse with his brother and cousin, Lyle Thompson will finish his collegiate career at Albany without his familiar teammates.
